about_the_game:
You were excited to take a vacation with your father, but things took a turn for the worse when your plane crashed on an unknown island in the Bermuda Triangle during a dark and stormy night. As you and the other passengers struggle to survive, strange things begin to happen. Your father is missing and the other passengers are acting as if they are infected with a mysterious illness.

As you explore the island as a 16-year old boy, you soon realize that it is not a normal place. It is controlled by a General who is conducting a secret research project called "Inferno" with the goal of creating a formula to cure all viruses and diseases in the world. However, his research involves testing on unwilling human subjects, including the stranded passengers.

In order to escape the island and find your father, you must gather essential items and fight your way to the General's secret lab. But it won't be easy. The island is filled with dangers and obstacles, and time is running out.

Will you be able to survive the night on the Silent Islands and make it back home with your father? Only time will tell.

Features:

A fascinating and original story.
Unique horror-survival elements.
